Macros

#define EQUILIBRATE_LOOP(__CODE__)
 Loops over 10 temperatures and 10 pressures between 1000-10000 K (linear) and 10-100000 Pa (log) and equilibrates the mixture at each (T,P) combination before running the given code snippet. More...
 
#define MIXTURE_GSI_MASS_LOOP(__CODE__)
 Loops over mixtures for Gas-Surface Interaction Mass Balance, loads each mixture and runs CODE in Catch SECTION which is the name of the mixture. More...
 
#define MIXTURE_LOOP(__CODE__)
 Loops over mixtures, loads each mixture and runs CODE in Catch SECTION which is the name of the mixture. More...

◆ EQUILIBRATE_LOOP

#define EQUILIBRATE_LOOP (   __CODE__)
Value:
for (int ip = 0.0; ip < 10; ++ip) {\
double P = std::exp(ip/9.0*std::log(100000.0)+std::log(10.0));\
for (int it = 0.0; it < 10; ++it) {\
double T = 1000.0*it + 1000.0;\
mix.equilibrate(T, P);\
__CODE__ ;\
}\
}

Loops over 10 temperatures and 10 pressures between 1000-10000 K (linear) and 10-100000 Pa (log) and equilibrates the mixture at each (T,P) combination before running the given code snippet.
